languages.text: "То, что еретик лишь взошел на костер, но под ним еще не успело заняться пламя, еще не значит, что его дела идут хорошо. Спичка в моих руках, и лишь твои действия решают, суждено ей зажечься или нет. Вот и все, что я хотел сказать".

"Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed in flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."
languages.original_text: "То, что еретик лишь взошел на костер, но под ним еще не успело заняться пламя, еще не значит, что его дела идут хорошо. Спичка в моих руках, и лишь твои действия решают, суждено ей зажечься или нет. Вот и все, что я хотел сказать".

traits.locale_text: "For a heretic who is already at the stake, but not burning yet, 'so far so good' would be a most unwise reading of the situation. I am the one holding the match, and your actions and yours only will decide if I strike it or not. That is all I meant to say."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For a heretic who is already at the stake, but not burning yet, 'so far so good' would be a most unwise reading of the situation. I am the one holding the match, and your actions and yours only will decide if I strike it or not. That is all I meant to say."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed by flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed by flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: "Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed in flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Solo porque un hereje esté pisando brasas y aún no haya empezado a arder no significa que esté fuera de peligro. La cerilla está en mis manos, y sus actos decidirán si la prendo o no. Es cuanto tengo que decir».
languages.original_text: "Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed in flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: «Solo porque un hereje esté pisando brasas y aún no haya empezado a arder no significa que esté fuera de peligro. La cerilla está en mis manos, y sus actos decidirán si la prendo o no. Es cuanto tengo que decir».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “异端分子仅仅踏入了火海，并没有被烈焰吞没，但这并不能代表没有问题。火柴在我手里，而你接下来的行动，会决定我是否要点着这根火柴。我想说的只有这么多。”
languages.original_text: "Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed in flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: “异端分子仅仅踏入了火海，并没有被烈焰吞没，但这并不能代表没有问题。火柴在我手里，而你接下来的行动，会决定我是否要点着这根火柴。我想说的只有这么多。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si un hérétique n'est pas réduit en cendres sur-le-champ après avoir marché dans les flammes, ça ne veut pas forcément dire que tout va bien. C'est moi qui ai l'allumette, et seuls vos actes me feront décider si, oui ou non, je dois l'utiliser. C'est tout ce que j'ai à dire. »
languages.original_text: "Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed in flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: « Si un hérétique n'est pas réduit en cendres sur-le-champ après avoir marché dans les flammes, ça ne veut pas forcément dire que tout va bien. C'est moi qui ai l'allumette, et seuls vos actes me feront décider si, oui ou non, je dois l'utiliser. C'est tout ce que j'ai à dire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「異端者が火中に足を踏み入れたが、まだ炎に包まれていないからといって、物事がうまくいっているとは限らない。マッチは俺の手の中にあり、俺がそれを打つかどうかを決めるのはあなたの行動だけだ。俺が言うべきことは、それだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed in flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者が火中に足を踏み入れたが、まだ炎に包まれていないからといって、物事がうまくいっているとは限らない。マッチは俺の手の中にあり、俺がそれを打つかどうかを決めるのはあなたの行動だけだ。俺が言うべきことは、それだけだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Dass ein Ketzer ins Feuer getreten ist, aber noch nicht von den Flammen verschlungen wurde, bedeutet ja nicht, dass alles in Ordnung ist. Ich halte das Streichholz in der Hand, und nur Euer Verhalten entscheidet darüber, ob ich es anreiße oder nicht. Mehr habe ich nicht zu sagen."
languages.original_text: "Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed in flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: "Dass ein Ketzer ins Feuer getreten ist, aber noch nicht von den Flammen verschlungen wurde, bedeutet ja nicht, dass alles in Ordnung ist. Ich halte das Streichholz in der Hand, und nur Euer Verhalten entscheidet darüber, ob ich es anreiße oder nicht. Mehr habe ich nicht zu sagen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bir kâfirin ateşe adım atmış fakat henüz alevlerle kaplanmamış olması, işlerin iyi gittiği anlamına gelmez. Kibrit benim elimde, onu yakıp yakmayacağımı hareketlerin belirleyecek. Diyeceklerim bu kadar."
languages.original_text: "Just because a heretic has stepped into the fire, but is not yet engulfed in flames, does not mean things are going well. The match is in my hands, and only your actions will decide whether or not I strike it. That is all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: "Bir kâfir ateşe adım atmışsa fakat henüz alevlerle kaplanmadıysa bu, işlerin iyi gittiği anlamına gelmez. Kibrit benim ellerimde, onu yakıp yakmayacağıma senin hareketlerin karar verecek. Söyleyeceklerim bu kadar."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
